item.title: About me / Sobre mí
item.description: Born and raised in Gran Canaria, the Canary Islands, in northwest Africa. I graduated in Economics at University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria with a MSc in Statistics at Polytechnic University of Catalonia in the lovely Barcelona (2017). On the professional side, I am currently working as Data Scientist at Kernel Analytics. I am a R enthusiast as well as interested in Statistics, Economics, Politics and… a devoted supporter of my football team, UD Las Palmas.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me through my email.
